entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

Humidity: 85 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
